TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Cure Poison I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A simple spell that will cure poisoning (food and environmental). Will also cure toxic buildup, chaos corruption, and similar afflictions.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Cure Poison II
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A simple spell that will cure poisoning (food and environmental). Will also cure toxic buildup, chaos corruption, and similar afflictions. Will affect multiple targets if they're close to one another.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Cure Poison III
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A simple spell that will cure poisoning (food and environmental). Will also cure toxic buildup, chaos corruption, and similar afflictions. Will affect multiple targets if they're close to one another.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Cure Poison IV
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A simple spell that will cure poisoning (food and environmental). Will also cure toxic buildup, chaos corruption, and similar afflictions. Will affect multiple targets if they're close to one another.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Raise Ground I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any soft or wet ground will be raised, and therefore dried out, by one level. Will not affect dry ground. Will raise deep water to the next higher grade; therefore requires a few castings in order to raise deep water to dry ground.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Raise Ground II
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any soft or wet ground will be raised, and therefore dried out, by one level. Will not affect dry ground. Will raise deep water to the next higher grade; therefore requires a few castings in order to raise deep water to dry ground.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Raise Ground III
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any soft or wet ground will be raised, and therefore dried out, by one level. Will not affect dry ground. Will raise deep water to the next higher grade; therefore requires a few castings in order to raise deep water to dry ground.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Raise Ground IV
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any soft or wet ground will be raised, and therefore dried out, by one level. Will not affect dry ground. Will raise deep water to the next higher grade; therefore requires a few castings in order to raise deep water to dry ground.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Transport I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A spell to facilitate mass transportation of people, animals, and items across the planet. Creates a magic transportation pod that can be used for long range transport. If unused, the magic energy will dissipate eventually. Be wary: The magic supporting the transportation platform will dissipate before long, and there will be a small explosion at its location.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Transport II
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: A spell to facilitate mass transportation of people, animals, and items across the planet. Creates a magic transportation pod that can be used for long range transport. If unused, the magic energy will dissipate eventually. Be wary: The magic supporting the transportation platform will dissipate before long, and there will be a small explosion at its location.

Creates a magic transportation pod that can be used for long range transport. If unused, the magic energy will dissipate eventually. TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Transport IV

Creates a magic transportation pod that can be used for long range transport. If unused, the magic energy will dissipate eventually. TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Lower Ground I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock will be lowered, and flooded with water. If the ground is currently soil, it will become shallow water. If it is currently shallow water, it will become deep water. Any structures or existing flooring that reside upon the lowered ground may be destroyed.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Lower Ground II
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock will be lowered, and flooded with water. If the ground is currently soil, it will become shallow water. If it is currently shallow water, it will become deep water. Any structures or existing flooring that reside upon the lowered ground may be destroyed.

Any structures or existing flooring that reside upon the lowered ground may be destroyed.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Zone of Fertility I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The caster targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock or water saturated will become rich soil, with high fertility yield.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Zone of Fertility II
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The caster targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock or water saturated will become rich soil, with high fertility yield.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Zone of Fertility III
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The caster targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock or water saturated will become rich soil, with high fertility yield.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Zone of Fertility IV
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description: The caster targets a location, and any ground that isn't solid rock or water saturated will become rich soil, with high fertility yield.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Light Cantrip I
TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.description:
Creates a light that will burn of its own accord for a long period of time before extinguishing.

Simple light spells are a common spell for new mages to learn.

Will not produce sufficient light to grow plants by.

TheEndTimes_Magic.MagicAbilityDef.label: Light Cantrip II

Will not produce sufficient light to grow plants by..
